name: Qt Virtual machine manager
tagline: qt virtual machine manager libvirt spice vnc lxc kvm qemu xen openvz vbox vmware
body:
![qt-virt-manager icon](https://f1ash.fedorapeople.org/Pictures/virtual-engineering.png)

qt-virt-manager
=================
is the GUI for (remote) control a Virtual machines and entities.

[![Gitter](https://badges.gitter.im/F1ash/qt-virt-manager.svg)](https://gitter.im/F1ash/qt-virt-manager?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge)

[![Yandex_money](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/F1ash/qt-virt-manager/master/src/icons/128x128/actions/yandex_money.png)](https://money.yandex.ru/embed/donate.xml?account=410014229313543&quickpay=donate&payment-type-choice=on&mobile-payment-type-choice=on&default-sum=300&targets=Donation+for+develop&target-visibility=on&project-name=QtVirtManager&project-site=http://f1ash.github.io/qt-virt-manager&button-text=01)
***

![Qt Logo](http://d3hp9ud7yvwzy0.cloudfront.net/wp-content/themes/oneqt/images/favicon.ico.gzip)

Uses Qt as framework for GUI.

![Made with libvirt](http://libvirt.org/madeWith.png)

Uses [libvirt](http://libvirt.org/index.html) as the back-end management API for controls a virtual entities.

![SPICE logo](http://www.spice-space.org/images/favicon.png)

Uses [Spice client viewer](http://www.spice-space.org) for graphic consoles
to guest domains.

![VNC logo]( https://raw.githubusercontent.com/F1ash/qt-virt-manager/master/Pictures/vnc_logo.png )

Uses [VNC client viewer](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Virtual_Network_Computing) for graphic consoles to guest domains.

***

![Fedora logo](https://getfedora.org/static/images/fedora-logotext.png)

Development occurs based on the package database of [Fedora](https://fedoraproject.org).

Application is present as package

 * in repo: `dnf install qt-virt-manager` (Qt5 only)

 * in [Fedora Copr](https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/f1ash/QtVirtManager/):
 `dnf install qt4-virt-manager` or  `dnf install qt5-virt-manager`

 * in [FedoraPeople](https://f1ash.fedorapeople.org/qt-virt-manager/)

***

The `Main` window for seeing to the log journal, for common operation with connections and their (aka virtual entities) virtual machines (VM), networks, storages, interfaces, secrets.

![Main widget]( https://raw.githubusercontent.com/F1ash/qt-virt-manager/master/Pictures/snapshot13.png )

The `VM Settings` window for create/edit a virtual machines (domains).

![VM Device Settings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/F1ash/qt-virt-manager/master/Pictures/snapshot18.png)

The SPICE/VNC `VM Viewer` for graphical control a VMs with support graphic channel.

![VM Spice Display](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/F1ash/qt-virt-manager/master/Pictures/snapshot14.png)

The LXC `VM Viewer` for graphical control a lxc containers.

![LXC Console](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/F1ash/qt-virt-manager/master/Pictures/snapshot15.png)

![Boot in Spice Display](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/F1ash/qt-virt-manager/master/Pictures/snapshot16.png)
***
Does not contain platform-specific components.
